name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1 day 4 colors【#ホロ4期生ライブ2025】 [H8A2CZiyc_E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs the song 'Guitar to Kodoku to Aoi Wakusei' on a brightly lit 3D stage.
scenes.song_name: Guitar to Kodoku to Aoi Wakusei

scenes.description: A transition sequence featuring a clock face counting down on the stage floor.
Amane Kanata performs the song 'Katahane' on stage with illustrative graphics on the backdrop screen.

subtitles.original: ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星 / 歌：常闇トワ
subtitles.english: Guitar, Solitude, and the Blue Planet / Vocals: Tokoyami Towa

subtitles.original: 季節の変わり目の服は
subtitles.english: The clothes for the change of seasons

subtitles.original: 何着りゃいいんだろ
subtitles.english: What should I wear?

subtitles.original: 春と秋
subtitles.english: Spring and autumn

subtitles.original: どこいっちゃったんだよ
subtitles.english: Where did they go?

subtitles.original: 息も出来ない　情報の圧力
subtitles.english: Can't even breathe, the pressure of information

subtitles.original: めまいの螺旋だ　わたしはどこにいる
subtitles.english: A spiral of dizziness, where am I?

subtitles.original: こんなに　こんなに　息の音がするのに
subtitles.english: Even though I can hear my own breathing so clearly

subtitles.original: 変だね　世界の音がしない
subtitles.english: It's strange, I can't hear the sounds of the world

subtitles.original: 足りない　足りない　誰にも気づかれない
subtitles.english: Not enough, not enough, no one notices me

subtitles.original: 殴り書きみたいな音　出せない状態で叫んだよ
subtitles.english: Screaming in a state where I can't make a sound like a scribble

subtitles.original: 「ありのまま」なんて誰に見せるんだ
subtitles.english: Who would I show "my true self" to?

subtitles.original: 馬鹿なわたしは歌うだけ
subtitles.english: Stupid me, I just sing

subtitles.original: ぶちまけちゃおうか　星に
subtitles.english: Shall I pour it all out to the stars?

subtitles.original: エリクサーに張り替える作業も　なんとなくなんだ
subtitles.english: The task of changing to Elixir strings is just kind of whatever

subtitles.original: 欠けた爪を少し触る
subtitles.english: I touch my chipped fingernail a bit

subtitles.original: 半径300mmの体で必死に鳴いてる
subtitles.english: Desperately crying out with a body of 300mm radius

subtitles.original: 音楽にとってココが地球だな
subtitles.english: For music, this is Earth

subtitles.original: 空気を握って　空を殴るよ
subtitles.english: I grip the air and punch the sky

subtitles.original: 何にも起きない　わたしは無力さ
subtitles.english: Nothing happens, I'm powerless

subtitles.original: だけどさ　その手で　この鉄を弾いたら
subtitles.english: But if I pluck these steel strings with those hands

subtitles.original: 何かが変わって見えたような
subtitles.english: It felt like something changed

subtitles.original: 眩しい　眩しい　そんなに光るなよ
subtitles.english: Dazzling, dazzling, don't shine so brightly

subtitles.original: わたしのダサい影がより色濃くなってしまうだろ
subtitles.english: My uncool shadow will only become more distinct

subtitles.original: なんでこんなに熱くなっちゃって止まんない
subtitles.english: Why did it get so hot and won't stop?

subtitles.original: 馬鹿なわたしは歌うだけ
subtitles.english: Stupid me, I just sing

subtitles.original: うるさいんだって心臓
subtitles.english: My heart is so loud

subtitles.original: 蒼い惑星　ひとりぼっち　いっぱいの音を聞いてきた
subtitles.english: Blue planet, all alone, I've heard so many sounds

subtitles.original: 回り続けて幾億年　一瞬でもいいから...
subtitles.english: Revolving for billions of years, even for a moment...

subtitles.original: ああ　聴いて　聴けよ
subtitles.english: Ah, listen, listen to me!

subtitles.original: わたし　わたし　わたしはここにいる
subtitles.english: I, I, I am right here

subtitles.original: 殴り書きみたいな音　出せない状態で叫んだよ
subtitles.english: Screaming in a state where I can't make a sound like a scribble

subtitles.original: なりたい　なりたい　何者かでいい
subtitles.english: I want to be, I want to be, someone, anyone

subtitles.original: 馬鹿なわたしは歌うだけ
subtitles.english: Stupid me, I just sing

subtitles.original: ぶちまけちゃおうか　星に
subtitles.english: Shall I pour it all out to the stars?

subtitles.original: とおい　とおい　むかしばなし
subtitles.english: A long, long time ago story

subtitles.original: それはきっと　あすのはなし
subtitles.english: That is surely a story of tomorrow

subtitles.original: 片羽 / 歌：天音かなた
subtitles.english: One Wing / Vocals: Amane Kanata

subtitles.original: “もう　飛べやしないさ”
subtitles.english: "I can't fly anymore"

subtitles.original: 落ち続ける夜から醒めた
subtitles.english: I woke up from the night of continuous falling

subtitles.original: 白い部屋の片隅で
subtitles.english: In a corner of a white room

subtitles.original: 彷徨ってる　自由をなくして
subtitles.english: Wandering around, having lost my freedom

subtitles.original: 塞ぐ　倒れ込んだまま
subtitles.english: Shutting myself in, having collapsed

subtitles.original: ああ　細い片翼が
subtitles.english: Ah, a thin single wing...

subtitles.original: ああ　ないんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, ...is gone

subtitles.original: 叫んだ　心が止まらなくて
subtitles.english: I screamed, my heart wouldn't stop

subtitles.original: 機械みたいに　きしむ僕を　現実が嗤った
subtitles.english: Reality sneered at me as I creaked like a machine

subtitles.original: その時　誰かが囁いたんだ
subtitles.english: At that moment, someone whispered

subtitles.original: 「あなたに　あげた　つばさ」
subtitles.english: "The wings I gave you"
